summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Privity Share Booking System enhanced features. All major enhancements including client fields, employee restrictions, approval workflow, OCR integration, and client-employee mapping are working correctly.
passed_tests: Client creation with new fields (address, pin_code, mobile, bank_accounts)
Multiple bank accounts per client functionality
Employee role restrictions - cannot access vendors
Employee role restrictions - can only see own clients
Employee buying price restriction in bookings
Frontend client creation dialog with new fields
Frontend OCR document upload (PAN, CML, Cheque)
Frontend table structure with new columns
